URL.description: Matches web URLs with optional protocols, subdomains, paths, queries, and fragments.

PhoneNumber.description: Matches international and local phone numbers in various formats.

CreditCardNumber.description: Matches 16-digit credit card numbers with optional separators.

PostalCode.description: Matches U.S. ZIP codes with optional extended code.

Hashtag.description: Matches hashtags in social media posts.

Mention.description: Matches user mentions in social media.

Time12Hour.description: Matches time in 12-hour format with AM/PM.

BookTitle.pattern: \b(?:'The Great Gatsby'|'To Kill a Mockingbird'|'1984'|'Pride and Prejudice'|'The Catcher in the Rye')\b

FilePath.description: Matches file paths in Windows or Unix formats.

ChessMove.description: Matches algebraic notation of chess moves.

CloudService.description: Matches names of cloud service providers.

YouTubeVideoID.description: Matches YouTube video IDs in URLs.

IPv4Subnet.description: Matches IPv4 addresses with subnet masks.

ChemicalCASNumber.description: Matches Chemical Abstracts Service registry numbers.

OrderNumber.description: Matches order numbers starting with 'ORD' followed by 6 digits.

InvoiceNumber.description: Matches invoice numbers starting with 'INV' followed by 6 digits.

DeviceSerialNumber.description: Matches device serial numbers starting with 'SN'.

MusicKey.description: Matches musical keys like 'C major', 'A minor'.

SeminarCode.description: Matches seminar codes starting with 'SEM' followed by 4 digits.

DateWithDayOfWeek.description: Matches dates with day of the week.

AsynchronousProgrammingTerm.description: Matches terms related to asynchronous programming.

MilitaryTime.description: Matches military time without colon, e.g., '2359'.

ComputerPortNumber.description: Matches computer port numbers between 0 and 65535.

HTTPHeaderField.description: Matches common HTTP header field names.

Request.pattern: \b(?:could you|would you|please|can you|I need|I want|I would like)\b

NumberWord.description: Matches number words from one to ten.

DenialPhrase.pattern: \b(?:no way|not at all|definitely not|I don't think so|absolutely not)\b

OpinionExpression.pattern: \b(?:I think|in my opinion|I believe|it seems to me|from my perspective)\b

Suggestion.pattern: \b(?:you should|why don't you|how about|maybe try|I suggest|perhaps you could)\b

Offer.pattern: \b(?:would you like|can I get you|do you want|may I offer|let me get you)\b

PreferenceExpression.pattern: \b(?:I prefer|I'd rather|I like|I enjoy|I love|I dislike|I hate)\b

DisagreementExpression.pattern: \b(?:I disagree|not quite|I'm not sure about that|I don't think so|actually)\b

IntentPhrase.pattern: \b(?:I want to|I'm going to|I plan to|I intend to|I'm thinking of)\b

ContactInformation.pattern: \b(?:email me|call me|text me|my number is|my email is)\b

FarewellTimeSpecific.pattern: \b(?:good night|see you tomorrow|see you later|have a good day|take care)\b

Idiom.pattern: \b(?:break a leg|hit the sack|piece of cake|once in a blue moon|under the weather)\b

SarcasmIndicator.description: Matches phrases that may indicate sarcasm.

HowAreYouResponse.description: Matches common responses to 'How are you?'

ExpressionOfDisliking.pattern: \b(?:I hate|I dislike|I can't stand|I detest|I loathe)\b

AbilityExpression.pattern: \b(?:I can|I can't|I could|I couldn't|I am able to|I was able to)\b

NecessityExpression.pattern: \b(?:I need to|I have to|I must|I should|I ought to)\b

IntentionExpression.pattern: \b(?:I'm going to|I plan to|I'm planning to|I intend to|I'm aiming to)\b

ConfusionExpression.pattern: \b(?:I don't understand|what do you mean|I'm confused|can you clarify)\b

DissatisfactionExpression.pattern: \b(?:that's not good|disappointing|unsatisfactory|not what I expected|could be better)\b

NumberWordHigh.description: Matches number words from eleven to twenty.

PhysicalState.pattern: \b(?:I'm hungry|I'm tired|I'm cold|I'm hot|I'm thirsty|I'm sleepy)\b

DesireExpression.pattern: \b(?:I wish|I'd like|I want|I desire|I hope to)\b

WeatherCondition.pattern: \b(?:it's raining|it's sunny|it's snowing|it's cloudy|it's windy|it's stormy)\b

LocationPhrase.pattern: \b(?:at home|at work|in the park|in the office|in the car|at school)\b

OriginQuestion.pattern: \b(?:where are you from\?|where do you live\?|what's your origin)\b

DoubtExpression.pattern: \b(?:I doubt it|I don't think so|unlikely|probably not|doubtful)\b

HobbyQuestion.pattern: \b(?:what do you like to do\?|do you have any hobbies\?|what are your interests\?)\b

Encouragement.pattern: \b(?:you can do it|don't give up|keep going|stay strong|believe in yourself)\b

SympathyExpression.pattern: \b(?:I'm sorry to hear that|that's too bad|I sympathize|my condolences)\b

TimeQuery.pattern: \b(?:what time is it\?|do you have the time\?)\b
TimeQuery.description: Matches questions about the current time.

LocationQuery.pattern: \b(?:where are you\?|where am I\?|what's this place\?)\b

WeatherQuery.pattern: \b(?:is it going to rain\?|what's the weather\?|how's the weather\?|weather forecast)\b

CommonFarewell.pattern: \b(?:goodbye|see you later|talk to you soon|farewell|take care)\b

ApologyResponse.pattern: \b(?:no problem|it's okay|don't worry about it|no worries|that's alright)\b

NegativeFeedback.pattern: \b(?:needs improvement|not quite right|could be better|try again|unsatisfactory)\b

ExpressionsOfFrustration.pattern: \b(?:argh|this is frustrating|I'm annoyed|can't stand this|so irritating)\b

ExpressionsOfConfusion.pattern: \b(?:I'm lost|I don't get it|what's going on|I'm puzzled|perplexed)\b

ExpressionsOfDisagreement.pattern: \b(?:I disagree|not exactly|I'm not sure about that|I don't think so)\b

AskingForHelp.pattern: \b(?:can you help me\?|I need help|could you assist me\?|help me please)\b

ExpressingThanks.pattern: \b(?:thanks a lot|thank you very much|much obliged|I appreciate it)\b

ComplaintExpression.pattern: \b(?:this is unacceptable|I'm not happy with|this sucks|I'm disappointed|this is bad)\b
ComplaintExpression.description: Matches expressions of complaint or dissatisfaction.

ComplimentExpression.pattern: \b(?:you look great|well done|good job|you're amazing|you did well)\b

ApologyAcceptance.pattern: \b(?:no problem|it's okay|don't worry about it|all good|no worries)\b

ExpressionOfLove.pattern: \b(?:I love you|love ya|I adore you|you're the best|lots of love)\b
ExpressionOfLove.description: Matches expressions of love or affection.

ReminderRequest.pattern: \b(?:remind me to|set a reminder for|don't let me forget to|I need to remember to)\b

ScheduleQuery.pattern: \b(?:what's my schedule|do I have any appointments|what's next on my calendar|any meetings today)\b

JokeRequest.pattern: \b(?:tell me a joke|make me laugh|got any jokes|say something funny)\b

InterestExpression.pattern: \b(?:that sounds interesting|tell me more|I'm curious|I'd like to know more|I'm interested in|I like|I enjoy|I'm into|I'm keen on)\b

QuestionAboutBot.pattern: \b(?:what can you do\?|who made you\?|are you real\?|do you have feelings\?|how do you work\?)\b
QuestionAboutBot.description: Matches questions directed at the bot.

SuggestionResponse.pattern: \b(?:good idea|I'll consider it|sounds good|maybe I will|I'll think about it)\b

EncouragementResponse.pattern: \b(?:thanks for the support|I appreciate it|that means a lot|thank you)\b

RequestForInformation.pattern: \b(?:tell me about|what is|do you know|can you explain|give me info on)\b

RepetitionRequest.pattern: \b(?:pardon|say that again|I didn't catch that|can you repeat that|what was that)\b

ClarificationRequest.pattern: \b(?:what do you mean|can you clarify|I'm not sure I understand|explain that please)\b

CorrectionExpression.description: Matches expressions used to correct someone.

HabitExpression.pattern: \b(?:I usually|I tend to|I often|I generally|most of the time)\b

PastExperience.pattern: \b(?:I once|I used to|back in the day|previously|in the past)\b

FuturePlan.pattern: \b(?:I'm going to|I plan to|I'm planning to|I'll be|I'm intending to)\b

PromiseExpression.pattern: \b(?:I promise|you have my word|trust me|I assure you|I swear)\b

SkepticismExpression.pattern: \b(?:really\?|are you sure\?|I doubt it|hmm|that's hard to believe)\b

SecretExpression.pattern: \b(?:don't tell anyone|it's a secret|keep this between us|confidentially)\b

ExpressingPreference.pattern: \b(?:I'd rather|I prefer|I'd like|I'd choose|my preference is)\b

ExpressingRegret.pattern: \b(?:I regret|I shouldn't have|if only|I wish I hadn't|my bad)\b

GreetingReturn.pattern: \b(?:hi there|hello|hey|good to see you|nice to meet you)\b

ChallengeExpression.pattern: \b(?:prove it|I dare you|let's see|I bet you can't|challenge accepted)\b

ProverbExpression.pattern: \b(?:early bird catches the worm|a stitch in time saves nine|better late than never|actions speak louder than words|practice makes perfect)\b

ProhibitionExpression.pattern: \b(?:don't|you must not|no one should|it's forbidden|not allowed)\b

PermissionRequest.pattern: \b(?:may I|can I|is it okay if I|do you mind if I|would it be alright)\b

SuggestionAcceptance.pattern: \b(?:good idea|sounds good|let's do that|I'm up for it|sure thing)\b

SelfIntroduction.pattern: \b(?:my name is|I'm called|they call me|I am)\s\w+

AskingForOpinion.pattern: \b(?:what do you think|how do you feel about|what's your opinion|any thoughts on|do you reckon)\b
AskingForOpinion.description: Matches phrases asking for someone's opinion.

OfferingAssistance.pattern: \b(?:can I help you|need a hand|do you need anything|how can I assist|let me know if you need anything)\b

ExpressingSelfDoubt.pattern: \b(?:I doubt myself|not sure I can do this|I feel insecure|lack confidence|I'm uncertain)\b

ExpressingShame.pattern: \b(?:I'm ashamed|feel guilty|so embarrassed|I shouldn't have done that|what was I thinking)\b

ExpressingNostalgia.pattern: \b(?:those were the days|I miss the old times|remember when|back in the day|feeling nostalgic)\b

ExpressingEmpathy.pattern: \b(?:I understand how you feel|I can relate|I've been there|I know what you mean|that must be tough)\b

ExpressingDesireToQuit.pattern: \b(?:I give up|can't do this anymore|throwing in the towel|I'm done|that's it for me)\b
ExpressingDesireToQuit.description: Matches expressions of wanting to quit.

ExpressingAnnoyanceAtRepetition.pattern: \b(?:you already said that|stop repeating yourself|I heard you the first time|why are you repeating\?|this again\?)\b
ExpressingAnnoyanceAtRepetition.description: Matches expressions of annoyance at repetition.

ExpressingSatisfactionWithService.pattern: \b(?:great service|you've been very helpful|thanks for your assistance|I'm satisfied with this)\b
ExpressingSatisfactionWithService.description: Matches expressions of satisfaction with service.

ExpressingDissatisfactionWithService.pattern: \b(?:I'm not satisfied|this isn't what I expected|poor service|I'm disappointed with this)\b

ExpressingUrgency.pattern: \b(?:I need it now|as soon as possible|it's urgent|can't wait|immediately)\b

ExpressingUncertaintyAboutFuture.pattern: \b(?:I don't know what's next|uncertain about the future|not sure where to go from here|the future is unclear)\b
ExpressingUncertaintyAboutFuture.description: Matches expressions of uncertainty about the future.

ExpressingResignation.pattern: \b(?:it is what it is|can't be helped|nothing I can do|oh well|I give up)\b

ExpressingAnticipation.pattern: \b(?:can't wait|looking forward to it|excited about|anticipating|eagerly awaiting)\b

ExpressingFearOfMissingOut.pattern: \b(?:don't want to miss out|everyone else is doing it|I feel left out|missing out)\b
ExpressingFearOfMissingOut.description: Matches expressions of fear of missing out.

ExpressingDisbelief.pattern: \b(?:I can't believe it|no way|seriously\?|you're joking\?|this can't be real)\b

ExpressingSelfEncouragement.pattern: \b(?:I can do this|stay strong|keep pushing|don't give up|you've got this)\b

ExpressingMotivation.pattern: \b(?:I'm motivated|feeling inspired|ready to take on the world|let's do this)\b

ExpressingLackOfInterest.pattern: \b(?:not interested|doesn't appeal to me|I'll pass|not my thing|no thanks)\b
ExpressingLackOfInterest.description: Matches expressions of lack of interest.

ExpressingNeedForRest.pattern: \b(?:I need a break|time to rest|need some downtime|time to relax)\b

ExpressingReadiness.pattern: \b(?:I'm ready|let's go|all set|prepared for this|good to go)\b

ExpressingContentment.pattern: \b(?:I'm content|feeling satisfied|this is enough|happy with how things are)\b

ExpressingJealousy.pattern: \b(?:I'm jealous|wish I had that|they're so lucky|I want that too)\b

ExpressingReliefAfterWorry.pattern: \b(?:glad that's over|what a relief|I was worried for nothing|phew)\b
ExpressingReliefAfterWorry.description: Matches expressions of relief after worry.

ExpressingRomanticInterest.pattern: \b(?:I like you|interested in you|want to get to know you|attracted to you)\b

ExpressingNeedForHelp.pattern: \b(?:I need help|can someone assist me\?|I can't do this alone|help me)\b

ExpressingGratitudeAdditional.pattern: \b(?:thanks a million|you're a lifesaver|couldn't have done it without you|much appreciated)\b

ExpressingUrgencyAdditional.pattern: \b(?:hurry up|it's urgent|can't wait any longer|time is of the essence)\b

ExpressingAppreciationForTime.pattern: \b(?:thanks for your time|appreciate you taking the time|thank you for listening)\b
ExpressingAppreciationForTime.description: Matches expressions of appreciation for someone's time.

ExpressingConcernForOthers.pattern: \b(?:are you okay\?|do you need help\?|I'm here for you|let me know if you need anything)\b
ExpressingConcernForOthers.description: Matches expressions of concern for others.

ExpressingFrustrationWithSelf.pattern: \b(?:why did I do that\?|can't believe I messed up|I'm so stupid)\b
ExpressingFrustrationWithSelf.description: Matches expressions of frustration with oneself.

ExpressingSurpriseAtOutcome.pattern: \b(?:didn't expect that outcome|that was surprising|wow, who knew\?|what a twist)\b
ExpressingSurpriseAtOutcome.description: Matches expressions of surprise at an outcome.

ExpressingSkepticismAboutSelf.pattern: \b(?:not sure if I can|doubt my abilities|I might fail|don't know if I'm up to it)\b

ExpressingSurpriseAtSelf.pattern: \b(?:I can't believe I did that|did I just do that\?|what was I thinking\?|that's so unlike me)\b
ExpressingSurpriseAtSelf.description: Matches expressions of surprise at one's own actions.

ExpressingDesireToLearn.pattern: \b(?:I want to learn|teach me|how do I|I'm interested in knowing|can you show me)
ExpressingDesireToLearn.description: Matches expressions of desire to learn something.

ExpressingInterestInEvent.pattern: \b(?:I'd like to attend|sounds interesting|count me in|I'm interested in that event)\b
ExpressingInterestInEvent.description: Matches expressions of interest in an event.

ExpressingPreferenceForOption.pattern: \b(?:I'd prefer option one|I like the second one better|my choice is the first option)\b
ExpressingPreferenceForOption.description: Matches expressions of preference for options.

ExpressingNeedForInformation.pattern: \b(?:I need more info|can you tell me more|where can I find details|I have questions about)\b

ExpressingSatisfactionWithOutcome.pattern: \b(?:that worked out well|couldn't be happier|this is great news|exactly what I wanted)\b
ExpressingSatisfactionWithOutcome.description: Matches expressions of satisfaction with an outcome.

ExpressingDesireToTryAgain.pattern: \b(?:let me try again|I can do better next time|I'll give it another shot|I want to try once more)\b
ExpressingDesireToTryAgain.description: Matches expressions of wanting to try again.

ExpressingAgreementWithSomeone.pattern: \b(?:I agree with you|you're right about that|couldn't agree more|that's a good point)\b
ExpressingAgreementWithSomeone.description: Matches expressions of agreement with someone.

ExpressingDesireToHelp.pattern: \b(?:how can I help\?|let me assist you|I'd like to help|can I do anything to assist)\b
ExpressingDesireToHelp.description: Matches expressions of wanting to help.

ExpressingConfusionAboutDecision.pattern: \b(?:can't decide|I'm torn between|not sure which to choose|need help deciding)\b
ExpressingConfusionAboutDecision.description: Matches expressions of confusion about a decision.

ExpressingDisappointmentInSelf.pattern: \b(?:I'm disappointed in myself|I let myself down|could have done better|I failed)\b
ExpressingDisappointmentInSelf.description: Matches expressions of disappointment in oneself.

ExpressingDesireForChange.pattern: \b(?:I need a change|want to try something new|time for a new start|looking for a change)\b
ExpressingDesireForChange.description: Matches expressions of desire for change.

ExpressingGratitudeForUnderstanding.pattern: \b(?:thanks for understanding|I appreciate your patience|thank you for being patient with me)\b
ExpressingGratitudeForUnderstanding.description: Matches expressions of gratitude for someone's understanding.

ExpressingNeedForClarification.pattern: \b(?:I need clarification|can you elaborate|not clear to me|could you explain further)\b

ExpressingEnthusiasm.pattern: \b(?:this is awesome|super excited|can't wait to start|thrilled about this)\b

ExpressingPreferenceForTime.pattern: \b(?:I'd prefer in the morning|evening works better for me|can we do it later\?|I'd rather do it now)\b

ExpressingCuriosity.pattern: \b(?:I'm curious|wondering about|would like to know|what if)\b

ExpressingFrustrationWithOthers.pattern: \b(?:why can't they understand\?|this is frustrating me|I'm annoyed with them|they're not getting it)\b
ExpressingFrustrationWithOthers.description: Matches expressions of frustration with others.

ExpressingDesireForPrivacy.pattern: \b(?:I need some privacy|can we talk in private\?|I'd rather not share that|that's personal)\b
ExpressingDesireForPrivacy.description: Matches expressions of desire for privacy.

ExpressingSympathy.pattern: \b(?:I'm sorry to hear that|you have my sympathy|that's unfortunate|I feel for you)\b

ExpressingDesireToEndConversation.pattern: \b(?:I have to go now|let's continue this later|we'll talk later|gotta run)\b
ExpressingDesireToEndConversation.description: Matches expressions indicating a desire to end the conversation.

ExpressingNeedForAssistance.pattern: \b(?:could you help me with|I need assistance with|can you assist me in|I'm having trouble with)\b
